channel.title: CVE Feed for MediaWiki -- MediaWiki
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaWiki -- MediaWiki

item.title: CVE-2017-0366|2024-08-05T13:03:57.058Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: Mediawiki before 1.28.1 / 1.27.2 / 1.23.16 contains a flaw allowing to evade SVG filter using default attribute values in DTD declaration.

item.title: CVE-2017-0364|2024-08-05T13:03:56.801Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: Mediawiki before 1.28.1 / 1.27.2 / 1.23.16 contains a flaw where Special:Search allows redirects to any interwiki link.

item.title: CVE-2017-0361|2024-08-05T13:03:56.820Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: Mediawiki before 1.28.1 / 1.27.2 / 1.23.16 contains an information disclosure flaw, where the api.log might contain passwords in plaintext.

item.title: CVE-2017-0369|2024-08-05T13:03:56.986Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: Mediawiki before 1.28.1 / 1.27.2 / 1.23.16 contains a flaw, allowing a sysops to undelete pages, although the page is protected against it.

item.title: CVE-2017-0368|2024-08-05T13:03:57.017Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: Mediawiki before 1.28.1 / 1.27.2 / 1.23.16 contains a flaw making rawHTML mode apply to system messages.

item.title: CVE-2018-0503|2024-08-05T03:28:10.915Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: Mediawiki 1.31 before 1.31.1, 1.30.1, 1.29.3 and 1.27.5 contains a flaw where contrary to the documentation, $wgRateLimits entry for 'user' overrides that for 'newbie'.

item.title: CVE-2017-0367|2024-08-05T13:03:57.030Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: Mediawiki before 1.28.1 / 1.27.2 contains an unsafe use of temporary directory, where having LocalisationCache directory default to system tmp directory is insecure.

item.title: CVE-2017-0370|2024-08-05T13:03:57.076Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: Mediawiki before 1.28.1 / 1.27.2 / 1.23.16 contains a flaw were Spam blacklist is ineffective on encoded URLs inside file inclusion syntax's link parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-0504|2024-08-05T03:28:11.013Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: Mediawiki 1.31 before 1.31.1, 1.30.1, 1.29.3 and 1.27.5 contains an information disclosure flaw in the Special:Redirect/logid

item.title: CVE-2017-0363|2024-08-05T13:03:56.660Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: Mediawiki before 1.28.1 / 1.27.2 / 1.23.16 has a flaw where Special:UserLogin?returnto=interwiki:foo will redirect to external sites.

item.title: CVE-2018-0505|2024-08-05T03:28:11.001Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: Mediawiki 1.31 before 1.31.1, 1.30.1, 1.29.3 and 1.27.5 contains a flaw where BotPasswords can bypass CentralAuth's account lock

item.title: CVE-2017-0365|2024-08-05T13:03:56.927Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: Mediawiki before 1.28.1 / 1.27.2 / 1.23.16 contains a XSS vulnerability in SearchHighlighter::highlightText() with non-default configurations.

item.title: CVE-2017-0362|2024-08-05T13:03:56.827Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: Mediawiki before 1.28.1 / 1.27.2 / 1.23.16 contains a flaw where the "Mark all pages visited" on the watchlist does not require a CSRF token.

item.title: CVE-2018-13258|2024-08-05T09:00:34.528Z -- mediawiki -- mediawiki
item.description: Mediawiki 1.31 before 1.31.1 misses .htaccess files in the provided tarball used to protect some directories that shouldn't be web accessible.
